formula: a(n) = (n!*sum(k=1..n, (C((n-2)/2,(n-k)/2)*(-1)^((n-k)/2)*((-1)^(n-k)+1))/k!))/2, n>0, a(0)=1. - _Vladimir Kruchinin_, May 18 2011E.g.f.: exp(x/sqrt(1+x^2)). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Nov 08 2013a(n) = -(3*n^2 - 12*n + 11)*a(n-2) - 3*(n-4)*(n-3)^2*(n-2)*a(n-4) - (n-6)*(n-5)*(n-4)^2*(n-3)*(n-2)*a(n-6). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Nov 09 2013Lim sup n->infinity |a(n)|/(2*n^(n-1/3)*exp(3/4*n^(1/3)-n)/sqrt(3)) = 1. - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Nov 09 2013Limit n->infinity a(n)/(2*n^(n-1/3)*exp(3/4*n^(1/3)-n)/sqrt(3)) - cos(3/4*sqrt(3)*n^(1/3) + Pi/6 - Pi/2*mod(n,4)) = 0. - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Nov 09 2013
author: Patrick Demichel (patrick.demichel(AT)hp.com)
